document.masterDocTitle: A revision of the genera Anilaroides Théry, 1934, stat. nov. and Tetragonoschema Thomson, 1857 (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Buprestinae: Anthaxiini)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A revision of the genera Anilaroides Théry, 1934, stat. nov. and Tetragonoschema Thomson, 1857 (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Buprestinae: Anthaxiini)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Tetragonoschema purpurascens
Kerremans, 1897 : 15
. Type locality: Brazil , Pernambuco, Serra de Commuuaty, Aquas Bellas.

Tetragonoschema latum
Théry, 1944 : 18
,
syn. nov.
Type locality: Paraguay

Tetragonoschema missionarium
Obenberger, 1947 : 6
,
syn. nov.
Type locatity: Argentina , Missiones, Concepción, Santa María.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type specimens studied.
T. purpurascens
(number of syntypes unknown),
lectotype (
Fig. 21
), here designated (female, MNHN ): “[ Brasil ] Aquas Bellas, Pernambuco [p] //
purpurascens Kerr.
Type [h] //
Tetragonoschema purpurascens
n. sp. [h] Kerremans det. [p] // Muséum Paris Coll. E. Gounelle 1915 [p]”
;
T. latum
,
holotype (
Fig. 22
) by monotypy ( female , MNHN ): “ Paraguay [h] // collection v. d. Pool [p] // lata Théry [h] Type [p] // Muséum Paris 1935 coll. A. Théry [p]”
;
T. missionarium
(number of syntypes unknown),
lectotype (
Fig. 23
), here designated (female, NMPC ): “Misiones-Argentina, Dep.[artamento] Concep.[ción] Sta María, M. J. Viana [p] // Typus [p, red] //
Tetragonoschema missionarium
m. Type [h] Det. D r. Obenberger [p] // Mus. Nat. Pragae Inv. [p] 22839 [h]”.

Further specimens studied.
ARGENTINA . SANTIAGO DEL ESTERO: Chaco, Resistencia,
18 .x. 1936
, Denier leg. (
1 male
, MNCN );
MISIONES: Loreto,
xi. 1962
, M. Viana leg. (
2 females
, JEBC );
Sta Maria,
xi. 1958
, M. Viana leg. (
1 female
, JEBC );
BRAZIL
. GUANABARA: Botafogo, M. Alvarenga leg.,
ix. 1970
(
1 female
, MNCN );
PARAGUAY .
SAN PEDRO : Juan Pedro Cororo,
xii. 1983
(
1 male
, NMPC );
no precise data (
1 female
, ISNB )
.

Since the number of syntypes of
T. purpurascens
is unknown I hereby designate the female from MNHN as the lectotype of
T. purpurascens
.

Since the number of syntypes of
T. missionarium
is also unknown I hereby designate the female from MNPC as the lectotype of
T. missionarium
.

Having studied the lectotype of
Tetragonoschema purpurascens
, holotype of
T . ( T .) latum
and lectotype of
T . ( T .) missionarium
I fail to find any difference and I conclude they are conspecific with
T . ( T .) purpurascens
,
T . ( T .) latum Théry
and
T . ( T .) missionarium
being junior synonyms of
T . ( T .) purpurascens
.

The holotype of
T . ( T .) latum
and the lectotype of
T . ( T .) missionarium
are merely large females of
T . ( T .) purpurascens
.
Sexual dimorphism. The female differs from male only in its black ventral surface (black with a red lustre in male).
